content: --विवाहः one of the eight forms of marriage described in <ls>Ms. 3. 27</ls> &c.; in this form marriage proceeds entirely from love or the mutual inclination of a youth and maiden without ceremonies and without consulting relatives; it is, as Kālidāsa observes, कथमप्यबांधवकृता स्नेहप्रवृत्ति <ls>Ś. 4. 16.</ls>
